import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Body, CardArticle, Container, ContainerArticle, Header, Title, Thumbnail, TitleArticle, Description, BodyArticle, BodyText, CardInfo, ContainerEdit, Icon, } from "../styled/Home"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faPencil, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { UseDataContext } from "../context/context"; import ModalPage from "../components/Modal"; export default function HomePage() { const { auth, user, handleLogout, article } = UseDataContext(); useEffect(() => {}, [auth, article]); return (
Seja Bem Vindo! {user} CRUD
{article.map((item, i) => ( {item.title} {item.description} {item.body} ))}
); }
